title: If you could rid the world of one political ideology, which one would it be, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: The ideology that is most harmful to the world, is the one that suggests society can be made better through having a central control. There isn’t one, but they are all linked through the words of Carl Marx. They are either known as Marxism, Socialism, Communism etc - each is a subset of the other, with subtle differences. The aim seems to be that Marxism is used to create a more socialist society which will eventually become a communist one. They have been practicing for 150 years, and killed over 100 million people but there still isn’t a working utopia anywhere in the world that isn’t held up by a capitalistic funding stream somewhere or just outright lying in the accounting department!
